ac: 29, touch 16, flat-footed 24 (+3 armor, +1 deflection, +4 Dex, +1 dodge, +10 natural)
special_attacks: blood drain, children of the night (ghouls or shadows), create spawn, dominate (DC 17), energy drain (2 levels, DC 17), mythic power (4/day, surge +1d8), negative energy focus, scabrous claws, weapon training (heavy blades +1)
melee: +1 longsword +19/+14 (1d8+12/19-20 plus energy drain), slam +15 (1d4+4 plus energy drain)
treasure: NPC gear (potion of inflict serious wounds, +1 bolts (10), +1 leather armor, +1 longsword, mwk light crossbow, cloak of resistance +2, ring of protection +1, other treasure)
feats: AlertnessB, Combat ReflexesB, Deceitful, DisruptiveM, DodgeB, Greater Weapon Focus (longsword), Improved InitiativeB, M, Lightning ReflexesB, Mobility, Power Attack, Quick Draw, ToughnessB, Vital Strike, Weapon Focus (longsword), Weapon Specialization (longsword)
description: This aristocratic figure could easily pass for human if not for the grave-pale skin, red eyes, and long fangs.

sections.body: A mythic vampire has ties to the earliest of its kind, being either one of the first vampires or the offspring of such ancient creatures.

special_qualities: armor training 2, change shape (dire bat or wolf, beast shape II), gaseous form, overcome weakness (garlic, sunlight), shadowless, spider climb
name: Vampire, Mythic
skills: Bluff +21, Climb +14, Disguise +6, Intimidate +14, Perception +17, Ride +8, Sense Motive +17, Stealth +15
